title: Only when I call my wife the call drops and says lost signal and stopped responding
content: Only when I call my wife not when she calls me. Right at 30 seconds it drops and says it stopped responding. I went into safe mode same issue. Called Verizon they walked me through all the steps they could thing of, still same issue. Figured I could come her and see if anyone had any answers. TIA
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
